Detailed Description

A context for executing a request.

The context is used to tie together the request, the response, and optional application data. It is also used for internal data. 

 HttpContext *hcxt = HttpContext::createDefaultContext();
 hcxt.setHeader(gaia::base::String("Content-type"), 
                gaia::base::String("text/json"), false);
 hcxt.setCookieManager(cookieManager);
